addname.description: Add a new name to the list.

removename.description: Remove a name from the list.

adjustcount.description: Manually adjust the count for a name in the database.

bone.description: Add +1 bone to a selected name's count using a dropdown.

timestamp_conversion.description: Automatically detects timestamps in messages and converts them to Discord's timestamp format.
timestamp_conversion.usage: Send a message containing a timestamp, such as 'tomorrow at 5pm' or 'next Friday at noon'. The bot will reply with a converted timestamp.

settimezone.description: Set your timezone to see converted times. Only available in DM.

move.description: Move a specific item to a new location.

moveall.description: Moves all items in a category to a new location.

set_lobby.description: Set the lobby voice channel where users will be placed before creating temp voice channels.

set_category.description: Set the category where temporary voice channels will be created.

create_temp_vc.description: Creates a temporary voice channel that auto-deletes when empty.
create_temp_vc.usage: Join lobby channel to create a temporary voice channel
